info.name: deviantart.com - Shut it up.
info.description: A style made in frustration after trying to do right by them, by allowing their advertising.
info.additionalInfo: Seriously. I whitelisted them in my ad blocker, and DA still complains about my ad blocker. Their CORE promo BS next to the search submit button can shove it too. Goes well with the other Deviantart style I use, CORE No More.
